description: So your palate is looking for something different than just the&nbsp;usual tequila margarita? Why not try this Spicy Green Juice Margarita cocktail. It's made with lime juice, agave nectar, ginger-kale juice, and jalapeno salt to give it an extra zing!
name: Spicy Green Juice Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine all the ingredients.
